coreAttributes.name: Ink Vodka
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle in a minimalistic and entirely black design. The label reads 'Ink Vodka' and depicts a large splotch of the liquid this drink was named after.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/15)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_ICE, 3)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.25)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Ink Vodka, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. With a gulp, [npc.name] [npc.verb(start)] downing the liquid, discovering that despite its novelty colouration, it's almost completely tasteless.
